vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.35.8
§ Deborah = "bee"
1) the nurse of Rebekah who accompanied her from the house of Bethuel
2) a prophetess who judged Israel
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (2a)   nodriza de Rebeca; (2b)   esposa de Lapidot; profetisa y juez de Israel
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
底波拉 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "蜜蜂"
1) 利百加的保母, 從彼土利的家中開始陪伴她
2) 一個管理以色列的女先知
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
底波拉 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "蜜蜂"
1) 利百加的保母, 从彼土利的家中开始陪伴她
2) 一个管理以色列的女先知

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.4.4; married to Lappidoth (H3941)
§ Deborah = "bee"
1) the nurse of Rebekah who accompanied her from the house of Bethuel
2) a prophetess who judged Israel
